019package org.apache.wiki.api.exceptions;
020
021
022
023/**
024 *  Marks an erroneus jspwiki.properties file.  Certain properties have been marked as "required", and if you 
025 *  do not provide a good value for a property, you'll see this exception.
026 *  <P>
027 *  Check <TT>jspwiki.properties</TT> for the required properties.
028 */
029public class NoRequiredPropertyException extends WikiException {
030    
031    private static final long          serialVersionUID = 1L;
032
033    /**
034     *  Constructs an exception.
035     *
036     *  @param msg Message to show
037     *  @param key The key of the property in question.
038     */
039    public NoRequiredPropertyException( final String msg, final String key ) {
040        super( msg + ": key=" + key );
041    }
042
043}
